channel.title: Hi, I am Dan from BuiltOnAir
channel.description:
Hey y'all!
I'm Dan co-founder of BuiltOnAir a website with all the resources you need to learn how to use Airtable. We even launch 3 courses to teach coporates how to use Airtable.
Anyway, happy to be here :)

item.title: Hi, I am Dan from BuiltOnAir
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Welcome Dan, nice to have you here!

Read full topic
